messages.title: Let’s get Britain on the road to recovery
messages.content: Our economy is in a fragile state. One wrong move could send Britain tumbling back into recession. Now more than ever our country needs the right policies to get the economy moving again.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: As Chancellor of the Exchequer I would move immediately to get the banks lending to small businesses to kick-start the economy. We will break up the banks to ensure that people’s savings are never put at risk again. Our fairer tax plan will put money back in the pockets of ordinary families.

issues.economy: Our economy is in a fragile state. One wrong move could send Britain tumbling back into recession. Now more than ever our country needs the right policies to get the economy moving again.

leaflet.personalStatement: You can have real change and real recovery with the Liberal Democrats, or more years of recession and failure with the Conservatives and Labour. Please do give us your support.

politicalExperience.role: Shadow Chancellor of the Exchequer for the Liberal Democrats

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS - Make sure your voice is heard by signing up for a postal vote today using the form enclosed. Make sure your voice is the one that brings real change to Britain.
